content: what's up y'all
two minutes to tell you about 11d eleven is a static site generator
you can use it to transform any data including third party data into a
website it's easy to learn has fast build times
and it generates fast sites if you've been struggling with slow
builds eleventy benchmarks an output of about fifty thousand pages in
one minute so i guess if you had two minutes like
this video you could do that twice or you could load the eleventy docs
which were built with eleventy eighty one times on a 3g connection
one unique thing about 11d is that it isn't tied to any one
client-side javascript framework we don't add any javascript libraries
bundles or script boilerplate to your site's output
are you building a site with html and css well 11d
is perfect for that 11d isn't tightly coupled to a single template language
either we support 11 template types right out
of the box including markdown and plain javascript you can join our
11d performance leader boards see how your site ranks against others
in the community we're also coming up on 11 version 1.0
which is a super exciting milestone will be even faster
thanks to some really lovely build performance contributions from our
community we're also adding plug-in hooks to allow
community members to add their own templating languages
in fact the new netlify.com site is using eleventy with view components
to run completely server-side rendered view without any client-side javascript
required we've also seen plug-ins experimenting
with svelt and jsx too and finally incremental builds working
with custom template language support we're excited to see how this will
further our performance advantage over our heftier bundler-based competitors
so if you're looking for something that makes building for the web fun again try
eleventy check out the floating possum and see if
you can find the docs button on our website 11d.dev
was that two minutes you
